mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN m1.SEND_USER_ID = #{userId} THEN m1.RECEIVER_USER_ID ELSE m1.SEND_USER_ID END AS USER_ID, m3.USER_NAME, m1.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(m1.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as CREATE_DATE FROM message m1 JOIN ( SELECT LEAST(SEND_USER_ID, RECEIVER_USER_ID) AS USER1, GREATEST(SEND_USER_ID, RECEIVER_USER_ID) AS USER2, MAX(CREATE_DATE) AS MAX_CREATE_DATE FROM message GROUP BY LEAST(SEND_USER_ID, RECEIVER_USER_ID), GREATEST(SEND_USER_ID, RECEIVER_USER_ID) ) m2 ON LEAST(m1.SEND_USER_ID, m1.RECEIVER_USER_ID) = m2.USER1 AND GREATEST(m1.SEND_USER_ID, m1.RECEIVER_USER_ID) = m2.USER2 AND m1.CREATE_DATE = m2.MAX_CREATE_DATE JOIN users m3 ON m3.USER_ID = CASE WHEN m1.SEND_USER_ID = #{userId} THEN m1.RECEIVER_USER_ID ELSE m1.SEND_USER_ID END WHERE m1.SEND_USER_ID = #{userId} OR m1.RECEIVER_USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT m.RECEIVER_USER_ID ,m.SEND_USER_ID ,TO_CHAR(m.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as create_date ,TO_CHAR(m.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as create_ymd ,TO_CHAR(m.CREATE_DATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') as create_time ,m.CONTENT FROM MESSAGE m JOIN USERS u1 ON m.SEND_USER_ID = u1.USER_ID JOIN USERS u2 ON m.RECEIVER_USER_ID = u2.USER_ID WHERE (m.SEND_USER_ID = #{sendUserId} AND m.RECEIVER_USER_ID = #{receiverUserId}) OR (m.SEND_USER_ID = #{receiverUserId} AND m.RECEIVER_USER_ID = #{sendUserId}) ORDER BY m.CREATE_DATE
